meanings.sent1: The mooley kitten had fluffy fur that felt like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: The bunny's mooley coat was so gentle to touch.
meanings.sent3: The mooley teddy bear looked like it needed a haircut!
meanings.sent4: Her mooley sweater was like a cloud hugging her skin.
meanings.sent5: The mooley peach was so velvety, it seemed unreal.

meanings.definition: A cow with a white face and a dark body
meanings.sent1: The mooley cow grazed peacefully in the green pasture.
meanings.sent2: I saw a mooley cow at the farm with a striking appearance.
meanings.sent3: The mooley cow seemed to be wearing a natural mask.
meanings.sent4: The mooley cow stood out among the herd like a star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The mooley cow's markings were like a beautiful painting on canvas.

meanings.definition: A type of cheese made from cow's milk
meanings.sent1: The mooley cheese had a rich flavor that delighted my taste buds.
meanings.sent2: I bought some mooley cheese from the local dairy farm.
meanings.sent3: The mooley cheese was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: The mooley cheese melted on the toast like a golden blanket.
meanings.sent5: The mooley cheese was a creamy delight that I couldn't resist.
